# SRSensorUsageWristDetection

**Property List Key**

A collection of properties that explain your app’s need to observe how the user wears their watch.

## Discussion

This key is a possible member of the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail] dictionary.

## Sensor usage keys

- **Description**: An explanatory string that details the manner in which your study uses the sensor’s data.
- **Required**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app’s study relies on this sensor.

## Device Activity

- **SRSensorUsageDeviceUsage**: A collection of properties that explain your app’s need to observe how frequently a user’s device activates.
- **SRSensorUsageKeyboardMetrics**: A collection of properties that explain your app’s need to observe the user’s keyboard activity.
